entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -2.5°C

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High plus 1.
